        Return the username of the player
        Returns:
        The player's username

      • isOwner

        boolean isOwner()
        Check if the player is the owner of the channel
        Returns:
        true, if local player is the owner of the room false, otherwise

      • setId

        void setId(int i)
        Set the ID of the player
        Parameters:
        i - The numeric ID to set

      • setIsOwner

        void setIsOwner(boolean owner)
        Set the player as owner (or not wrt parameter owner) of channel
        Parameters:
        owner - true, if you want to elect the local player as owner false, otherwise

      • setScore

        void setScore(int score)
        Set the passed valued as player's score
        Parameters:
        score - The score to set

        status - The status to set
